document.full_text: government officials appealed for calm on friday after three days of attacks by ultranationalist mobs against dark-skinned foreigners in athens, set off by a fatal mugging.
document.title: europe: greece: nationalist mobs attack immigrants in athens
lines_and_colors: government officials appealed for calm on friday after three days of attacks by ultranationalist mobs against dark-skinned foreigners in athens, set off by a fatal mugging.
